title: Owen Cook: the century of safety and pandemic psychosis
cleaned_text:
Owen explains well how the new "safety" hysteria will come to fuck us all in the ass over and over.

Also, listen closely to what a true billionaire villain is obsessed with. it's not more money, it's not more women, it's not more yachts. It's CONTROL. That is what bill gates is obsessed with, a creepy snake.

Owen is spot on, except for his comments on Jesus & hell which he clearly misinterprets
